entities.name: harry potter

entities.name: ron

entities.name: dobby

entities.name: draco
entities.description: A character who is marching Griphook to Bellatrix. His presence indicates danger.

entities.name: griphook
entities.description: A creature being marched by Draco to Bellatrix.

entities.name: bellatrix
entities.description: The person who is receiving Griphook from Draco. Her presence indicates danger.

relationships.description: Dobby has come to rescue Harry Potter, as stated by Dobby himself.
Draco is marching Griphook to Bellatrix, indicating a transfer of the creature from Draco to Bellatrix.
